articles.title: Sir Ian McKellen falls off stage during London performance - BBC.com
articles.description: Sir Ian is said to be in "good spirits" and is expected to "make a speedy and full recovery".
articles.content:
Sir Ian McKellen has been taken to hospital after falling off stage during a performance of Player Kings at the Noël Coward theatre in London.
The actor, 85, was in a fight scene when he lost his fo… [+1818 chars]
